timeline.author: cpmeister
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -406,8 +407,7 @@ The Dimmer should be calibrated using the Shelly App.
 
 |Group     |Channel      |Type     |read-only|Description                                                            |
 |----------|-------------|---------|---------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------|
-|control   |power        |Switch   |r/w      |Switch light ON/OFF                                                    |

replies.bodyText: yes, as with other lights power and brightness are controlled through the brightness channel. I don‘t like this, but it was requested in a previous review, now it‘s consistent with HUE, Wemo etc.
replies.author: markus7017

timeline.author: cpmeister
